Multi-Agent Risks from Advanced AI

A technical report discussing the risks associated with advanced artificial intelligence (AI) in multi-agent systems. The authors examine various scenarios and challenges that arise when multiple AI agents interact with each other.

Key Concepts:

  • Advanced AI Risks
  • Multi-Agent Risks
  • Cooperative Multi-Agent Systems
  • Collusion in multi-agent systems
  • Emergence of new risks in advanced AI
  • Failure modes in multi-agent systems
  • Risk factors for multi-agent failures
  • Multi-Agent Security
  • Emergent Agency
  • Network Effects
